vem yog kuv pheej ntshai ib tsoom tuabneeg heev, hab ntshai kuv cov tuabneeg saib tsw taug kuv, kuv txhad nyob tuabywv tsw tawm dhau kuv lub qhov rooj moog,
mas kuv xaav kuas muaj ib tug noog kuv has. Nuav yog kuv txhais teg sau. Thov kuas tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus teb kuv. Kuv xaav tau tej lug kom kuv huv daim ntawv kws tug yeej kom sau.
Kuv yuav muab kwv hlo sau xub pwg moog, kuv yuav muab khi ca yaam le lub mom kub.
Kuv yuav qha kuv txhua kauj ruam rua nwg, kuv yuav moog cuag nwg yaam le ib tug thawj moog.
“Yog kuv daim teb quaj kom kuv, hab cov nav khais kws laij teb hov ib txhwj quaj,
yog kuv noj tej qoob hov tsw them nqe le, hab ua rua tej qub tswv teb hov tuag,
kuj thov ca xuav paug tuaj nyob tej mog chaw, hab nroj pas daab tuaj nyob qeb chaw.” Yauj le lug taag le nuav.
Yog le ntawm peb tug yawm hov txhad tseg tsw teb Yauj lawm, tsua qhov Yauj pum tas nwg ncaaj nceeg.
Tes Elihu kws yog Npalakhee tug tub yog tuabneeg Npub hab yog Laa cum txawm chim. Nwg chim rua Yauj vem Yauj has tas Yauj ncaaj nceeg tsw yog Vaajtswv ncaaj.
Nwg kuj chim rua Yauj peb tug kwvluag tsua qhov txawm yog puab teb tsw tau Yauj los puab tseed has tas Yauj txhum.
Elihu tog nrhw yuav has rua Yauj tsua qhov puab peb leeg hov laug dua nwg.
Thaus Elihu pum tas puab lub ncauj tsw muaj lug teb lawm nwg txhad chim.
Mas Npalakhee tug tub Elihu kws yog tuabneeg Npub teb tas, “Kuv tseed yau hab mej noob nyoog nchaav lawm, vem le nuav kuv txhad ua sab yau hab ntshai has tej kws kuv xaam pum rua mej.
Kuv has tas, ‘Ca cov kws muaj noob nyoog has, hab ca cov kws nyob ntau xyoo qha tswvyim.’
Qhov tseeb yog tug ntsuj plig kws nyob huv tuabneeg, yog tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus  tej paa, ua rua tuabneeg nkaag sab.
Tsw yog cov laug xwb txhad muaj tswvyim, lossws cov kws noob nyoog nchaav txhad nkaag sab qhov kws raug cai.
Vem le nuav kuv txhad has tas, ‘Thov noog kuv has, thov ca kuv has tej kws kuv xaam pum.’
“Kuv tog rawv noog mej tej lug hab noog mej tej lug txawj ntse, rua thaus mej nrhav saib yuav has daabtsw.
Kuv ua tuab zoo noog mej has, tsw muaj ib tug taav tau Yauj le, mej cov tsw muaj leejtwg teb tau Yauj tej lug.
Ceev faaj tsw xob has tas, ‘Peb tub ntswb tswvyim lawm, Vaajtswv yuav kov yeej Yauj, tsw yog tuabneeg.’
Yauj tsw tau has nwg tej lug rua kuv, mas kuv yuav tsw muab mej tej lug teb Yauj.
“Puab poob sab taag tsw teb dua le lawm, puab tsw muaj ib lu lug has le lawm.
Mas kuv yuav tog lov vem puab tsw has hab puab sawv hov ntawd tsw teb le?
Mas kuv yuav teb kuv tej lug, kuv yuav has tej kws kuv xaam pum,
tsua qhov kuv muaj lug puv nkaus qhov ncauj, tassws kuv lub sab tseed tswj kuv ca.
Kuv lub sab zoo le cawv txwv maab kws tsw muaj chaw tshwm chim, ib yaam le lub naab tawv cawv txwv maab tshab kws tub yuav tawg.
Kuv yuav tsum has, txhad le tshwm chim zoo mivntswv, kuv yuav tsum qheb kuv daim tawv ncauj teb.
Kuv yuav tsw has saib leejtwg ntsej muag le, lossws yuav tsw has lug mog lug muas qhuas leejtwg,
tsua qhov kuv tsw txawj has lug mog lug muas qhuas, yog ua le ntawd tug kws tswm kuv yuav rhuav tshem kuv.
Yauj 'e, nwgnuav thov noog kuv has, hab noog kuv tej lug huvsw.
Saib maj, kuv rua ncauj, mas kuv tug nplaig huv kuv qhov ncauj kuj has.
Kuv tej lug qha tej kev ncaaj nceeg huv kuv lub sab tshwm lug, hab kuv lub qhov ncauj paub daabtsw kuj has tseeb hlo.
Vaajtswv tug Ntsuj Plig tswm kuv, hab tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus tej paa ua rua kuv caj sa.
Yog koj teb tau kuv kuj teb los maj, ca le npaaj koj tej lug rua ntawm kuv xubndag hab sawv tseeg maj.
Saib maj, kuv nyob ib yaam le koj rua ntawm Vaajtswv xubndag. kuv kuj yog muab ib thooj aav nplaum puab lug xwb.
Koj tsw xob ntshai kuv es ua rua koj poob sab, kuv yuav tsw yuam koj kuas nyaav dhau.
“Tseeb tag, koj has rua kuv noog, hab kuv nov koj tej lug.
Koj has tas, ‘Kuv ua huv, tsw tau faav xeeb hlo le, kuv dawb huv, tsw muaj kev phem kev qas nyob huv kuv hlo le.
Saib maj, Vaajtswv ua plaub rua kuv, nwg suav has tas kuv yog nwg le yeeb ncuab.
Nwg muab kuv txhais kwtaw ntxwg rua raab cuab, hab zuv rawv kuv txhua txujkev.’
“Saib maj, zaaj nuav koj ua tsw raug cai. Kuv yuav teb koj. Vaajtswv luj dua tuabneeg.
Ua caag koj yuav caam nwg has tas, ‘Vaajtswv tsw teb tuabneeg  tej lug le’?
Tsua qhov Vaajtswv ua ib faab ob faab lug has, los tuabneeg tsw nkaag sab.
Thaus tuabneeg pw mo ntuj tsaug zug ceev puab ua npau suav hab ua yug quas toog sau puab lub txaaj pw,
mas thaus hov Vaajtswv qheb tuabneeg lub qhov ntsej nov, hab nwg tej lug qhuab ntuag ua rua puab ntshai,
sub Vaajtswv txhad ua kuas tuabneeg tig ntawm tej kws puab ua rov lug, hab txav tuabneeg txujkev khaav theeb pov tseg.
Nwg taav puab tug ntsuj plig ntawm lub qhov tuag, hab taav puab txujsa tsw raug nav ntaaj ua kuas puam tsuaj.
Tuabneeg raug kev mob nkeeg nplawm qhuab qha rua sau nwg lub txaaj pw, hab nwg tej pob txhaa mob heev kuj nplawm nwg tsw tu ncua le.
Nwg txujsa txhad le dhuav zaub mov, hab nwg lub sab kuj dhuav tej zaub mov kws qaab qaab.
Nwg cev nqaj sem zuj zug saib tsw pum le, nwg tej pob txhaa kws txeev saib tsw pum kuj tshwm tuaj.
Nwg tug ntsuj plig moog ze rua huv lub qhov tuag, hab nwg txujsa moog ze cov kws coj kev tuag lug.
Yog muaj ib tug tubkhai ntuj lug paab nwg, yog ib tug huv ib txheeb leej kws ua tug nyob nruab nraab es yuav qha qhov kws raug cai rua tuabneeg,
yog tug tubkhai ntuj hov khuvleej nwg hab has tas, ‘Thov tso nwg dim qhov kws moog rua huv lub qhov tuag, vem kuv nrhav tau nqe txhwv lawm.
Thov ca nwg tej nqaj mog zoo le tej mivnyuas mog cev nqaj, hab ca nwg rov qaab muaj zug yaam le thaus tseed hluas.’
mas tuabneeg yuav thov Vaajtswv hab Vaajtswv leeg yuav nwg, hab nwg yuav lug cuag Vaajtswv lub xubndag xyiv faab hlo. Hab Vaajtswv yuav pub nwg rov ua tug ncaaj nceeg.
Mas nwg yuav hu nkauj taab meeg ib tsoom tuabneeg tas, ‘Kuv tau ua txhum lawm hab muab qhov zoo ntxeev ua qhov phem, los kuv tsw raug txem le kws tswm nyog kuv raug.
Vaajtswv txhwv kuv tug ntsuj plig dim qhov kws moog rua huv lub qhov tuag mas kuv txujsa yuav pum txujkev kaaj.’
“Saib maj, Vaajtswv tau ua tej nuav huvsw rua tuabneeg ob zag peb zag,
sub txhad coj tau puab tug ntsuj plig tawm huv lub qhov tuag, qhov kaaj kws pub txujsa txhad ci rua puab.
Yauj 'e, ca le ua tuab zoo noog kuv has, nyob tuabywv mas kuv yuav has.
Yog koj muaj daabtsw has, kuj teb kuv, ca le has tsua qhov kuv xaav tsaa koj txujcai.
Yog koj tsw muaj lug has, kuj ca le noog kuv has, nyob tuabywv mas kuv yuav qha tswvyim rua koj.”
Mas Elihu has tas,
“Mej cov kws muaj tswvyim ca le noog kuv tej lug, mej cov kws txawj ntse, ca le tig ntsej noog kuv has.
Lub qhov ntsej swm noog tej lug, ib yaam le lub qhov ncauj swm zaub mov.
Thov ca peb xaiv yaam kws raug, ca peb kawm huv peb cov saib yaam twg zoo,
tsua qhov Yauj has tas, ‘Kuv tsw tau ua txhum, tassws Vaajtswv qhau kuv cai lawm.
Txawm yog kuv ua raug cai los kuv raug muab suav ua tuabneeg daag, txawm yog kuv tsw tau faav xeeb los kuv tej kav txhaab khu tsw zoo.’
Leejtwg yuav zoo le Yauj? Nwg haus txujkev thuaj luag ib yaam le haus dej,
nwg nrug tej tuabneeg phem koom ua ke, hab nrug cov tuabneeg limham moog ua ke.
Vem nwg has tas, ‘Qhov kws tuabneeg zoo sab rua huv Vaajtswv tsw muaj qaabhau daabtsw rua puab.’
“Vem le nuav, mej cov kws txawj nkaag sab, ca le noog kuv has, tsw muaj ib zag Vaajtswv yuav ua limham hlo le, hab tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus yuav ua txhum.
Vaajtswv yuav pauj rua tuabneeg lawv le puab tau ua lawd, hab Vaajtswv yuav ua rua puab raug lawv le puab lub neej.
Qhov tseeb, Vaajtswv yeej yuav tsw ua limham, hab tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus yuav tsw qhau txujcai.
Leejtwg tsaa Vaajtswv kaav lub qaab ntuj, lossws leejtwg muab lub nplajteb huvsw cob rua Vaajtswv?
Yog Vaajtswv rhu nwg tug ntsuj plig rov qaab, hab sau zog nwg tej paa rov qaab rua nwg,
tes txhua tug cev nqaj yuav puam tsuaj taag huvsw, hab tuabneeg yuav rov qaab moog ua moov aav xwb.
“Yog koj txawj ntse, ca le noog tej nuav, ca le noog kuv tej lug.
Tswm nyog ca tug kws ntxub qhov kws tu plaub ncaaj ua tug kaav lov? Koj yuav rau txem rua tug kws ncaaj nceeg hab muaj fwjchim lov?
Nwg yog tug kws has rua vaajntxwv tas, ‘Koj tsw muaj nqes daabtsw,’ hab has rua cov kws ua hlub tas, ‘Koj yog tuabneeg limham,’
yog tug kws tsw saib cov thawj ntsej muag lossws saib hlub cov nplua nuj heev dua cov pluag, tsua qhov cov tuabneeg nuav huvsw yog Vaajtswv txhais teg tswm.
Ib plag ntshws xwb puab kuj tuag taag, thaus ib taag mo tej tuabneeg tshee quas nyo hab taag swm neej lawm, hab cov kws muaj fwjchim kuj raug coj moog lawm, tsw yog tuabneeg txhais teg ua.
“Vaajtswv lub qhov muag saib ntsoov tuabneeg txujkev, hab nwg pum puab txhua kauj ruam.
Tsw muaj duab tsaus lossws qhov tsaus ntuj quas nti kws cov tuabneeg phem yuav tswv nraim tau.
Vaajtswv tsw teem caij rua leejtwg moog cuag Vaajtswv txais kev txav txem.
Vaajtswv rhuav tshem cov kws muaj fwjchim tsw txug tshuaj saib, hab tsaa lwm tug lug nyob puab chaw.
Nwg paub puab tej num lawm txhad le muab puab xyeeb hlo tseg thaus mo ntuj, puab txhad ntsoog taag.
Vaajtswv ntaus puab taab meeg tuabneeg vem yog puab tej kev limham,
tsua qhov puab tig hlo ntawm Vaajtswv lawm, hab tsw quav ntsej nwg txujkev hlo le.
Vem le nuav puab txhad ua rua tej pluag lub suab quaj nrov tuaj txug Vaajtswv, mas nwg kuj noog cov kws txom nyem nyuaj sab lub suab.
Thaus Vaajtswv nyob tuabywv leejtwg yuav rau txem tau rua nwg? Thaus nwg fee plhu lawd leejtwg yuav pum tau nwg? Vaajtswv yeej saib tuabneeg hab tej tebchaws
sub tug kws tsw fwm Vaajtswv txhad tsw tau kaav hab tsw cuab qhov taub rua cov pejxeem.
“Muaj leejtwg has rua Vaajtswv tas, ‘Kuv raug nplawm lawm, kuv yuav tsw ua txhum ntxwv lawm,
thov qha tej kws kuv tsw pum rua kuv, yog kuv tau ua txhum txem, kuv yuav tsw ua ntxwv lawm’?
Vem koj tsw kaam txais tej kws Vaajtswv ua mas Vaajtswv yuav ua rua koj lawv le koj lub sab xaav lov? Koj yuav tsum xaiv, tsw yog kuv xaiv. Yog le nuav koj paub le caag ca le has moog.
Cov kws txawj ntse yuav has rua kuv hab tug muaj tswvyim kws noog kuv has yuav has tas,
‘Yauj has yaam le tsw paub qaabhau, nwg tej lug tsw muaj lub ntsab le.’
Xaav ca Yauj raug swm sab moog txug thaus kawg, tsua qhov nwg tej lug teb zoo yaam nkaus le tej tuabneeg limham tej lug.
Yauj muab qhov kws faav xeeb tsaav rua nwg lub txem, nwg npuaj teg thuaj luag rua huv plawv peb, hab ua ncauj ntau tawm tsaam Vaajtswv.”
Elihu has ntxwv tas,
“Koj xaav tas qhov nuav raug cai lov? Koj has tas, ‘Kuv ua ncaaj nceeg taab meeg Vaajtswv.’
Qhov kws koj nug tas, ‘Kuv yuav tau qaabhau daabtsw? Kuv tau daabtsw zoo tshaaj qhov kws kuv ua txhum?’
kuv yuav teb koj hab koj cov phoojywg.
Ca le tsaa muag saib sau nruab ntug, hab saib tej fuab kws nyob sab dua koj.
Yog koj ua txhum koj tau ua le caag rua Vaajtswv? Yog koj tej kev faav xeeb nthuav luj tuaj, koj yuav ua tau le caag rua Vaajtswv?
Yog koj ua ncaaj nceeg, koj pub daabtsw rua Vaajtswv, hab Vaajtswv tau txais daabtsw ntawm koj txhais teg?
Koj tej kev limham kuj yog ua rua tuabneeg zoo yaam le koj, hab koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg kuj yog muaj qaabhau rua tuabneeg.
“Yog tim raug kev quab yuam ntau heev, tuabneeg txhad quaj hu, puab quaj thov kev paab vem yog tug kws muaj fwjchim txhais teg.
Tassws tsw muaj ib tug has tas, ‘Vaajtswv kws tswm kuv nyob hovtwg? Yog tug kws pub lub suab hu nkauj thaus mo ntuj,
hab yog tug kws qha peb ntau dua qha tsaj txhu huv lub nplajteb hab ua rua peb ntse dua tej noog sau nruab ntug.’
Puab quaj hu hov ntawd vem yog tim cov tuabneeg phem tej kev khaav theeb tassws Vaajtswv tsw teb.
Vaajtswv yeej tsw noog tej suab kws tsw muaj qaabhau, hab tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus yeej tsw quav ntsej le.
Nwg yimfuab tsw noog koj rua thaus koj has tas koj tsw pum nwg, hab has tas tshaaj plaub nyob ntawm nwg xubndag hab koj tog rawv nwg.
Vem nwgnuav Vaajtswv txujkev chim tsw tau rau txem, hab nwg tsw quav ntsej tej kev faav xeeb pes tsawg,
mas Yauj txhad qheb ncauj has tej lug tsw muaj qaabhau, hab ua ncauj ntau has tej lug tsw paub taab.”
Mas Elihu rov has ntxwv tas,
“Thov ua sab ntev rua kuv mivntswv hab kuv yuav qha koj, vem kuv muaj tej yaam kws yuav nyob Vaajtswv chaw has rua koj.
Kuv yuav coj txujkev paub kws nyob deb lug, hab tsaa tug kws tswm kuv txujcai.
Qhov tseeb, kuv tej lug tsw yog daag, tug kws paub ib puas tsaav yaam huvsw nrug koj nyob nuav.
“Saib maj, Vaajtswv muaj fwjchim hab tsw tau saib tsw taug leejtwg, nwg muaj fwjchim nkaag sab zoo heev.
Nwg tsw tsom kwm cov tuabneeg limham txujsa, tassws nwg tsaa cov kws raug txom nyem txujcai.
Nwg tsw tau fee plhu ntawm cov kws ncaaj nceeg, tassws nwg tsaa puab nrug cov vaajntxwv nyob sau lub zwm txwv moog ib txhws, hab puab tau nyob sau lub chaw sab.
Yog puab raug saw hlau khi, hab maag kev txom nyem txuj hlua,
nwg kuj qha puab tej num hab puab tej kev faav xeeb rua puab tas, puab tau ua tuabneeg khaav theeb.
Nwg qheb puab lub qhov ntsej noog tej lug qhuab qha, hab qha kuas puab tig ntawm puab tej kev txhum txem rov lug.
Yog puab noog lug hab ua koom rua nwg, puab yuav nyob txwm nkaus puab lub noob nyoog vaam meej, hab nyob txwm nkaus puab lub xyoo kaaj sab quas lug.
Tassws yog puab tsw noog lug puab yuav raug nav ntaaj puam tsuaj, hab tuag taag vem yog tsw muaj kev paub.
“Cov kws tsw fwm Vaajtswv kuj khaws kev chim ca, thaus nwg muab puab khi, puab tsw thov kev paab.
Puab tuag thaus tseed hluas, hab puab txujsa taag rua huv plawv cov txwvneej muag cev ntawm tej tsev daab.
Vaajtswv swv txujkev txom nyem cawm tug kws txom nyem nyuaj sab, hab swv txujkev ceblaaj qheb nwg qhov ntsej.
Nwg yum koj tawm huv txujkev ntxhuv sab lug rua huv lub chaw daav kws tsw muaj chaw ti, hab tej kws tso rua sau koj lub rooj mov yog tej kws rog nphaws.
“Koj raug lub txem kws cov tuabneeg phem raug pov khawv nkaus, txujkev txav txem kws ncaaj lug caum nteg tau koj.
Ca le ceev faaj tsaam tes txujkev npau tawg ntxag kuas koj thuaj luag, hab xob ca tej nyaj xab ua rua koj yuam kev.
Koj tej nyaj txag  yuav paab tau koj dim txujkev ntxhuv sab lov? Lossws koj tug zug huvsw yuav paab koj tau lov?
Tsw xob ntshaw kuas tsaus ntuj, rua thaus tuabneeg raug muab txav ntawm puab lub chaw nyob.
Ceev faaj zoo, tsw xob tig moog nrhav txujkev txhum txem, vem koj xaiv yaam nuav heev dua xaiv kev txom nyem nyuaj sab.
Saib maj, Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus nyob lub chaw sab, leejtwg yuav txawj qhuab qha le nwg?
Leejtwg yog tug kws qha kev rua nwg? Lossws leejtwg yuav has tau tas, ‘Koj ua txhum lawm’?
“Ca le ncu ntsoov qhuas nwg teg num, kws tuabneeg tau hu nkauj txug hov lawm.
Tuabneeg suavdawg yeej saib ntsoov tej ntawd, hab tuabneeg yeej tuaj deb pum.
Saib maj, Vaajtswv luj kawg, peb tsw txawj paub nwg, nwg lub noob nyoog los yog yaam kws tsw paub suav le.
Nwg nqug tej ncos dej moog rua sau, muab tso huv cov fuab ua naag lug,
mas tej fuab muab hliv lug, txhad le lug ntau kawg rua tuabneeg.
Muaj leejtwg txawj nkaag sab qhov kws tej fuab nthuav daav, hab qhov kws muaj suab xub nthe huv Vaajtswv lub chaw nyob lov?
Saib maj, nwg tso tsag lig xub laim puag ncig nwg, hab nwg npug thoob plawg huv qaab thu havtxwv.
Nwg muab tej nuav lug txav txem rua ib tsoom tuabneeg, nwg pub kuas muaj zaub mov noj nplua quas mag.
Nwg txhais teg tuav rawv tsag lig xub, hab nwg khaiv moog tua tej qhov kws nwg tub hom tseg lawm.
Lub suab xub nthe yog ceeb toom tas naag xub naag cua yuav lug, hab tej tsaj txhu kuj qha tas naag yuav lug.
Tej nuav ua rua kuv lub sab tshee quas nyo, hab ua kuas ceeb poob plig taag le.
Ca le noog Vaajtswv lub suab kws nroo quas ntwg hab lub suab nrov quas voog kws tawm huv nwg lub qhov ncauj lug.
Nwg tso kuas moog thoob plawg txhua ceg kaum ntuj, hab tso nwg tej tsag lig xub moog thoob plawg huv lub nplajteb.
Nwg lub suab nrov ntwg lawv qaab moog, hab nwg swv nwg lub suab kws zoo tshaaj nroo nrov quas ntwg, nwg yeej tsw taav tsag lig xub rua thaus nov nwg lub suab nthe.
Vaajtswv ua nwg lub suab nroo ntwg phemfwj kawg le, hab nwg ua tej num luj kws peb tsw txawj nkaag sab.
Nwg has rua tej daus xwb daus npu tas, ‘Ca le lug rua sau lub nplajteb,’ hab has rua tej naag tshauv tas, ‘Ca le lug tej nam pluav hlub hlub.’
Vaajtswv taav tuabneeg txhua tug txhais teg, sub txhua tug kws nwg tswm lug txhad le kawm paub nwg tej num.
Thaus ntawd tej tsaj qus moog nkaum rua huv puab lub zeg, hab su huv puab tej qhov tsua.
Cua daaj cua dub tawm huv nwg lub chaw tuaj, cov cua no kuj ntsawj tuaj.
Vaajtswv ua paa tawm ua dej lawg, hab tej haav dej kuj nkoog taag.
Nwg muab dej naag rua tej fuab tsaus nti thauj, hab ua tsag lig xub laim lab vog huv tej fuab tuaj.
Tej fuab tig moog lawv le Vaajtswv coj, ua txhua yaam kws Vaajtswv has kuas tav thoob plawg rua huv lub nplajteb.
Nwg ua tej nuav tshwm lug nplawm qhuab qha kuj yog, lossws paab nwg lub tebchaws kuj yog, lossws qha nwg txujkev hlub ruaj khov kuj yog.
“Yauj 'e, ca le noog tej nuav, ca le nyob tuabywv tshuaj saib tej num phemfwj kws Vaajtswv ua.
Koj paub tas Vaajtswv qha le caag rua tej fuab hab ua le caag tsag lig xub txhad ci nplaag huv nwg tej fuab tuaj lov?
Koj paub tas yog le caag fuab yuav yaa tau rua sau ntuj lov? Yog tej num phemfwj kws tug muaj kev txawj ntse tshaaj plawg ua.
Koj lub cev kub quas lug huv koj tej rwg tsho, rua thaus lub nplajteb nyob ntsag tu vem yog raug cov cua kws ntsawj saab nraag tuaj.
Koj txawj nthuav lub ntuj yaam le Vaajtswv ua kuas tawv yaam le tej tooj lab kws nchuav swv ua av tau lov?
Ca le qha peb saib peb yuav has le caag rua Vaajtswv, vem tsaus ntuj lawm peb npaaj tsw tau peb tej lug.
Puas yuav has tau rua nwg tas kuv xaav has lug lov? Txeev muaj leejtwg xaav tas nwg xaav raug kev puam tsuaj lov?
Tuabneeg saib tsw tau qhov kaaj rua thaus lub nub ci quas nplaag sau ntuj, yog thaus cua ntsawj ua rua lub ntuj kaaj quas sw.
Thaus tej kub tug duab ci nplaag saab peg tuaj, Vaajtswv naav fwjchim meej mom kws txaus ntshai kawg.
Tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus mas peb ntswb tsw tau nwg, nwg muaj fwjchim luj heev hab nwg txav txem ncaaj, nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg muaj luj kawg nwg txhad tsw quab yuam leejtwg le.
Vem le nuav tuabneeg txhad fwm hab ntshai nwg. Vaajtswv yeej tsw quav ntsej tug kws nwg xaam pum tas nwg muaj tswvyim.”
Mas Yawmsaub teb huv cua daaj cua dub tuaj rua Yauj tas,
“Leejtwg has tej lug kws tsw muaj qaabhau tshaum tej kws kuv npaaj tseg lawd tsaus ntuj quas nti lawm?
Ca le sa hlaab khov kho yaam le ib tug txwvneej yawg, kuv yuav nug koj, koj yuav tsum teb kuv.
“Thaus kuv pua daim kws tag lub nplajteb koj nyob hovtwg? Yog koj nkaag sab, ca le qha rua kuv.
Leejtwg yog tug hom tas lub nplajteb yuav tswm luj le caag? Koj yeej paub tag los maj! Leejtwg muab hlua ntsuag lub nplajteb?
Daim taw tag lub nplajteb txawb rua sau daabtsw? Leejtwg pua thawj daim laag zeb tswm lub nplajteb,
rua thaus cov nub qub ci hu nkauj qhuas thaus kaaj ntug txoog, hab cov tubkhai ntuj  suavdawg qw zoo sab xyiv faab?
“Leejtwg muab qhov rooj thaiv dej havtxwv ca, rua thaus dej tshwm plawg huv nplajteb lub plaab lug?
Yog thaus kuv tswm fuab ua tsoog tsho rua havtxwv naav, hab muab qhov tsaus ntuj nti ua daim ntaub qhwv havtxwv,
hab tu nrwm rua dej nyob hab ua qhov rooj ua laag taav rua,
hab has tas, ‘Koj moog tau deb npaum le nuav xwb, tsw xob moog dhau nrwm, koj tej nthwv dej kws khaav quas ntxhas tsuas ndaas txwj le nuav xwb.’
“Txwj thaus yug koj lug koj tau qha kev rua qhov kaaj thaus taagkig, hab ua rua kaaj ntug paub nwg lub chaw nyob lov,
sub nwg txhad tuav rawv npoo nplajteb, hab thawv cov tuabneeg limham tawm huv lub nplajteb moog?
Lub nplajteb raug hloov yaam le cov aav nplaum kws ntaus hom thawj rua, hab pum txhua yaam meej yaam le tej tsoog tsho.
Cov tuabneeg limham qhov kaaj raug muab txeeb ntawm puab lawm, hab puab txhais npaab kws tsaa hlo raug muab luv lawm.
“Koj nkaag txug huv qhov kws dej havtxwv txhawv lug, lossws moog rua huv tej chaw nraim nreeg huv nruab tiv txwv lawm lov?
Lub qhov rooj kev tuag raug muab qha rua koj pum lov, lossws koj pum qhov tsaus ntuj nti lub rooj qho lawm lov?
Koj tub paub lub nplajteb luj hab daav le caag lawm lov? Yog koj paub tej nuav huvsw lawm, ca le has.
“Txujkev kws moog txug qhov kaaj lub tsev nyob rua hovtwg, hab qhov tsaus ntuj lub chaw nyob, nyob rua hovtwg
sub koj txhad coj tau qhov kaaj qhov tsaus ntuj moog rua huv nwg lub chaw, hab paub txujkev kws moog rua nwg lub tsev?
Nyab koj paub tsua qhov tub yug koj lawm, hab koj le noob nyoog tub ntau kawg lawm.
“Koj tub moog rua huv tej txhaab kws rau daus xwb daus npu, lossws pum tej txhaab kws rau dej lawg lawm lov?
Tej hov yog kuv npaaj ca rua thaus kws raug ceblaaj, hab nub kws sws tua hab ua rog.
Txujkev kws moog rua lub chaw faib qhov kaaj tawm lug, hab lub chaw kws cua saab nub tuaj tawm moog rua sau lub nplajteb nyob hovtwg?
“Leejtwg rhawv kwj rua tej nthwv naag lug, hab rhawv kev rua xub tua,
sub txhad tso naag lug rua sau lub tebchaws kws tsw muaj tuabneeg nyob, hab lug rua sau lub tebchaws ntuj nraag teb do kws tsw muaj leejtwg nyob,
sub lub tebchaws kws raug muab tso tseg nyob do cuas txhad le tsau npo, hab ua rua lub tebchaws tuaj nroj tsuag?
“Naag muaj txwv hab lov? Leejtwg yug tau dej lwg lug?
Dej lawg tawm huv leejtwg lub plaab mivnyuas lug, hab leejtwg yug tau tej te kws poob sau ntuj lug,
ua rua dej tawv le pob zeb, hab nplaim dej havtxwv nkoog?
“Koj khi tau tej nub qub Txhaj Txwv Mim ua ib ntsau, lossws daws tau txuj hlua khi nub qub Puj Sua Kwv Ntaas lov?
Koj coj tau tej nub qub moog lug lawv le nwg lub caij lub nyoog, lossws coj tau nub qub Khais hab nwg cov mivnyuas kev lov?
Koj paub tej kevcai kws kaav lub ntuj lov? Koj tsaa tau lub ntuj kaav lub nplajteb lov?
“Koj tsaa tau suab hu moog txug tej fuab, ua kuas naag lug hlub nyaab laum nkaus koj lov?
Koj khaiv tau tsag lig xub tawm moog lov? Hab tsag lig xub has rua koj tas, ‘Peb nyob ntawm nuav,’ lov?
Leejtwg pub tswvyim rua us dej dawb, lossws qha rua tug lauv qab to taub?
Leejtwg muaj tswvyim suav tau tej fuab? Leejtwg yuav nchuav tau lub naab dej sau ntuj lug,
rua thaus tej moov aav ndwg lug ua ib pawg, hab tej cos aav sws tuav ruaj?
“Koj tum tau nqaj rua tsuv ntxhuav noj, hab pub tau rua tej thaav tsuv ntxhuav noj tsau lov,
rua thaus tsuv pw plab lua rua huv nwg lub qhov tsua, lossws pw zuv rua huv lub chaw nraim?
Leejtwg npaaj nqaj rua uab voj noj, rua thaus nwg mivnyuas quaj rua Vaajtswv, hab thaus moog moog lug lug vem yog tshaib plaab?
Koj paub tas sai yug mivnyuas thaus twg, hab koj saib ntsoov maum muas lwj yug mivnyuas lov?
Koj suav tau nwg suab mivnyuas tsawg lub hli, hab koj paub lub swjhawm kws nwg xyaa mivnyuas lov,
yog thaus nwg pw ndo xyaa mivnyuas, hab xyaa tau tug mivnyuas mog?
Tej mivnyuas muaj zug tuaj hab hlub rua tom haav zoov, tes txawm tawm moog lawm tsw rov lug le.
“Leejtwg tso tug neeg luav qus nyob kaab ntsaab? Leejtwg daws hlua tso tug neeg luav moog?
Kuv muab lub tebchaws moj saab qhua rua nwg nyob, hab muab thaaj aav ntsev rua nwg nkaum.
Nwg thuaj luag tej suab nrov ntshu huv lub moos, nwg tsw nov tug kws caij lub suab qw.
Nwg moog moog lug lug sau tej roob kws yog nwg lub tshaav zaub, nwg nrhav txhua yaam zaub ntsuab ntsuab noj.
“Nyuj qus kaam ua koj qhev lov? Nwg yuav zuv ntawm koj lub daab zaub ib mos lov?
Koj muab hlua khi nyuj qus laij teb tau lov? Nwg yuav hai lob phuaj huv lub haav lawv koj qaab lov?
Koj yuav vaam nwg vem nwg muaj zug heev, hab muab koj tej num tso rua nwg ua lov?
Koj vaam tas nwg yuav rov lug, hab thauj koj tej qoob lug rua huv lub tshaav ntaus nua lov?
“Noog ntxhuav phob tis ntxuaj zoo sab hlo, tassws nwg phob tis hab cov plaub zoo le us dej dub lov?
Nwg tseg nwg tej qai rua huv aav, ca aav puag kuas suv,
tsw ncu tas tej zag ib txhais kwtaw yuav tsuj kuas tawg, hab tej tsaj qus yuav tsuj.
Nwg ua nruj ua tswv rua nwg cov mivnyuas yaam le tsw yog nwg le, nwg nkim nwg tug zug nteg qai xwb nwg tsw mob sab,
vem yog Vaajtswv ua rua nwg tsw muaj tswvyim, hab tsw pub ib qho kev txawj ntse rua nwg.
Thaus nwg swv zug dha tswv, nwg thuaj luag tug neeg hab tug kws caij neeg.
“Koj pub zug rua neeg lov? Koj cog txoob rua sau neeg cej daab lov?
Koj ua rua nwg dha caws qa yaam le kooj ntaas lov? Nwg lub suab tshuab khaav quas ntxhas txaus ntshai heev.
Nwg txauj teg huv lub haav hab xyiv faab hlo rua nwg tug zug, nwg tawm moog ua rog rua cov kws tuav cuab yeej ua rog.
Nwg thuaj luag txujkev ntshai hab tsw poob sab le, nwg tsw thim tswv nav ntaaj.
Raaj xub nrov quas zag sau nwg, hab raab muv nkaug hab raab muv laim ci nplaag.
Nwg dha nrawm moog hab npau tawg ceev nyaum kawg le, thaus nov dheev lub suab raaj kub yaaj nwg nyob tsw tswm le.
Thaus tshuab raaj kub yaaj nrov nwg hee quas lawg, nwg nov ntxhab ua rog deb deb, hab nov tej thawj rog lub suab txhwb hab lub suab qw.
“Koj tug tswvyim ua rua laj txawj yaa tshoom sab, hab nthuav nwg phob tis moog rua saab nraag lov?
Tug daav yaa sab sab lawv le koj has hab ua lub zeg rua tej chaw sab lov?
Nwg nyob ntawm qaab tsuas, hab ua zeg rua sau hauv tsua kws ruaj khov.
Nwg nyob hov ntawd nuam saib tej tsaj kws yuav tum, nwg lub qhov muag pum tsaj deb deb le.
Nwg tej mivnyuas haus ntshaav, tsaj raug tua tuag rua hovtwg, nwg kuj nyob hov ntawd.”
Yawmsaub has rua Yauj tas,
“Tug kws pheej ywg yuav caav tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus lov? Tug kws caav Vaajtswv ca nwg teb.”
Mas Yauj teb Yawmsaub tas,
“Kuv mas kuv yog tuabneeg tsw tswm txaj. Kuv yuav teb koj tau le caag? Kuv muab teg pus qhov ncauj.
Kuv tub has ib zag lawm, kuv yuav tsw teb, kuv tub has ob zag lawm, kuv yuav tsw has ntxwv.”
Mas Yawmsaub has huv cua daaj cua dub tuaj rua Yauj tas,
“Ca le sa hlaab khov kho yaam le ib tug txwvneej yawg, kuv yuav nug koj, koj yuav qha kuv.
Koj yuav has tas kuv ua tsw raug cai lov? Koj yuav rau txem tas kuv txhum sub koj txhad tsw txhum lov?
Koj muaj txhais npaab zoo ib yaam le Vaajtswv lov? Hab koj txawj ua suab nrov tseeg nkawg ib yaam le nwg ua lov?
Ca le muab meej mom hab fwjchim lug naav, hab muab koob meej hab fwjchim ci ntsaa ab lug qhwv koj lub cev.
Muab koj txujkev npau kws puv phwj yog nchuav lug, ca le saib ntsoov txhua tug kws khaav theeb hab muab txu kuas poob qeg.
Ca le saib txhua tug kws khaav theeb hab muab nqug kuas poob lug, hab tsuj ntag cov tuabneeg limham rua ntawm lub chaw kws puab sawv hov.
Muab puab txhua tug zais ua ke rua huv tej moov aav, muab puab lub ntsej muag khi ca rua huv nruab yeeb.
Tes kuv txhad leeg rua koj tas yog koj txhais teg xws paab tau koj kov yeej.
“Saib Npehemau nawj, nwg kuj yog kuv tswm ib yaam le tswm koj. Nwg nog zaub yaam le nyuj.
Saib nwg tug zug ntawm nwg lub duav, hab saib tug fwjchim huv tej leeg ntawm nwg lub plaab.
Nwg ua kuas nwg kwtwv tawv le ntoo cab, hab tej leeg ntawm nwg ncej qaab sws txuas zoo.
Nwg tej pob txhaa zoo le tej kaav tooj lab, nwg txhais kwtaw zoo yaam le tej yaag hlau.
Nwg yog tug tsaj tseem ceeb tshaaj kws Vaajtswv tswm lug, tsuas yog tug kws tswm nwg txhad coj tau ntaaj rua nwg.
Tej roob hlaav zaub rua nwg noj, yog lub chaw kws txhua yaam tsaj qus nyob ua sw.
Nwg pw huv qaab tsob ntoo ntxhuv hab huv haav lojkov hab huv paag hawv.
Tsob ntoo ntxhuv ua duab ntxoo rua nwg, tej ntoo lwg zaaj ntawm ntug dej nyob vej nwg.
Dej ntsawj ceev npaum twg nwg kuj tsw ntshai, txawm yog dej Yalatee fuam hlub ntsawj nwg qhov ncauj los nwg tso sab plhuav.
Leejtwg yuav muab nqai lauj nqai tau nwg? lossws ua hlua cuab tau nwg lub txwv ntswg?
Koj xuas nuv ntseg chob nqug tau Levi‑athaa  lug, lossws muab hlua khi tau nwg tug nplaig lov?
Koj muab hlua chaws tau nwg qhov ntswg, lossws muab nqai lauj nqai tau nwg puab tsaig lov?
Nwg yuav taij thov koj ntau lov? Nwg yuav has lug mog lug muas rua koj lov?
Nwg yuav nrug koj sws cog lug es koj txhad yuav nwg ua koj tug qhev moog ib txhws lov?
Koj yuav nrug nwg ua sw yaam le ib tug noog, lossws koj yuav muab hlua khi caab moog rua koj tej ntxhais hluas saib lov?
Tub luam yuav tuaj has nqe yuav nwg lov? Puab yuav muab nwg faib rua tej tub laag tub luam lov?
Koj xuas muv nkaug tau nwg daim tawv, lossws xuas muv nkaug chob tau nwg taubhau lov?
Cev teg ntsab nwg saib, xaav txug qhov kws sws ntsuag zug mas koj yuav tsw rov qaab ua dua.
Qhov kws yuav nteg nwg yog vaam do xwb. Thaus pum dheev nwg tuabneeg yuav poob sab nthaav.
Tsw muaj leejtwg nyaum txaus kws kaav zwg nwg. Mas leejtwg yuav sawv tiv tau kuv?
Leejtwg pub tau daabtsw rua kuv kws kuv yuav tsum pauj nwg? Txhua yaam kws nyob huv qaab ntuj nuav huvsw kuj yog kuv le.
“Kuv yuav tsw tseg qhov kws has txug nwg tej teg taw, hab nwg tug zug kws luj hab nwg lub cev kws zoo nkauj.
Leejtwg yuav laws tau nwg daim tawv saab nrau? Leejtwg yuav nkaug tau to nwg lub tsho hlau ob txheej?
Leejtwg yuav qheb tau nwg lub puab tsaig kws muaj kaug nav puag ncig txaus ntshai kawg?
Nwg lub nraus qaum muaj tej phaj hlau thaiv ua ib kaab saab lu ntum quas nti yaam le nas hom thawj rua.
Tej nplai hov nyob tuab ntwg, cua ntsawj tub nkaag tsw tau rua huv.
Tej nplai hov sws lu nkaus, ib nplai tshooj ib nplai, muab txaav tsw tau le.
Nwg txhub mas muaj duab ci laam lug, nwg lub qhov muag ci yaam le tug duab ci thaus kaaj ntug.
Teg tsau cig tawm huv nwg lub qhov ncauj lug, txaim tawg tawm lab vog lug.
Paa nchu tawm huv nwg lub qhov ntswg, yaam nkaus le lub laujkaub kws npau sau cub tawg lojkov.
Nwg le paa rauv thee cig, nplaim tawg tawm huv nwg lub qhov ncauj lug.
Nwg lub cej daab khov muaj zug heev, ntshai quas rwg rua ntawm nwg xubndag.
Nwg tej tawv plaab tuab npawv sws tais ob peb txheej, tawv nkawv txaav tsw tau le.
Nwg lub sab tawv yaam le pob zeb, hab tawv le txhwb nam zeb.
Thaus nwg tshwm plawg tuaj, tug kws muaj fwjchim  kuj ntshai, thaus nwg nplawm dej txaws txua puab poob sab nthaav.
Txawm yog nav ntaaj raug nwg los tsw to, txawm yog muv nkaug muv laim hab xub vug los tsw to le.
Nwg saib hlau zoo yaam le quav nyaab, hab tooj lab zoo yaam le ntoo po.
Raab xub kuj lawv tsw tau nwg tswv, lub qai zeb kws fav ntawm txuj hlua kuj zoo le quav nyaab.
Raab qws ntaus kuj zoo le quav nyaab xwb, nwg thuaj luag raab muv kws nkaug tuaj lub suab yaa.
Nwg lub qaab plaab ntse yaam le tej txhais laujkaub tawg, nwg nkaag huv cov aav nplaum zoo le lub thob log ntaus qoob.
Nwg ua rua dej huv qaab thu npau le lub laujkaub dej npau, nwg ua rua havtxwv npau le lub fwj roj tsw qaab.
Dej txaws dawb vog ib kaab lawv nwg qaab, ua rua luas xaav has tas dej havtxwv dawb hau.
Sau lub nplajteb tsw muaj ib yaam daabtsw zoo thooj le nwg, nwg yog tug kws tswm tau lug tassws tsw paub ntshai daabtsw le.
Nwg saib tsw taug txhua yaam kws nyob sab, nwg ua vaajntxwv kaav txhua yaam kws khaav quas ntxhas.”
Mas Yauj teb Yawmsaub tas,
“Kuv paub tas koj ua tau txhua yaam, hab tej kws koj xaav tseg lawd tsw muaj ib qhov yuav ua tsw tav.
Koj has tas, ‘Leejtwg tsw paub qaabhau es muab tej kws kuv npaaj tseg lawd zais?’ Kuv txhad has txug tej kws kuv tsw nkaag sab, yog tej phemfwj kws kuv tsw paub.
Koj has tas, ‘Noog maj, kuv yuav has, kuv yuav nug koj, koj yuav qha kuv.’
Kuv lub qhov ntsej txeev nov txug koj, tassws nwgnuav kuv lub qhov muag pum hlo koj ntaag.
Vem le nuav kuv txhad ntxub kuv tug kheej, hab kuv nyob huv tej moov aav hab tej plauv tshauv ntxeev dua sab.”

Thaus Yawmsaub has tej lug nuav rua Yauj taag lawm, Yawmsaub has rua Elifa kws yog tuabneeg Themaa tas, “Kuv npau tawg rua koj hab koj ob tug kwvluag, tsua qhov thaus mej has txug kuv mej has tsw raug lawv le kuv tug qhev Yauj has.

Vem le nuav mej ca le coj xyaa tug txwv nyuj hab xyaa tug txwv yaaj moog cuag kuv tug qhev Yauj, hab muab ua kevcai hlawv xyeem ua mej le feem, mas kuv tug qhev Yauj yuav thov kuv paab mej. Kuv yuav txais nwg tej lug thov kuv txhad tsw rau txem rua mej lawv le mej txujkev ruag, tsua qhov mej has txug kuv mej has tsw raug le kuv tug qhev Yauj has.”
Mas Elifa kws yog tuabneeg Themaa hab Npinta kws yog tuabneeg Su‑a hab Xaufa kws yog tuabneeg Na‑ama txhad moog ua lawv le Yawmsaub has, mas Yawmsaub txhad txais Yauj tej lug thov.
Thaus Yauj thov Yawmsaub paab nwg cov kwvluag taag lawm, Yawmsaub pub Yauj rov tau lub neej zoo. Yawmsaub pub Yauj muaj ntau dua qub ob npaug.

Mas nwg tej kwvtij nkauj muam hab txhua tug kws paub nwg lug lawd kuj tuaj cuag nwg hab nrug nwg noj mov huv nwg lub tsev. Mas puab mob sab nwg hab nplig nwg txug tej xwm txheej phem huvsw kws Yawmsaub coj lug raug nwg. Hab txhua tug ib leeg pub ib daim nyaj hab ib leeg pub ib lub nplhaib kub rua nwg.

Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua Yauj lub neej yaav kawg ntau dua le yaav taag lug. Mas nwg muaj ib vaam plaub txheeb tug yaaj, rau txheeb tug ntxhuav, ib txheeb nkawm txwv nyuj, hab ib txheeb tug maum neeg luav.
Nwg muaj xyaa tug tub hab peb tug ntxhais.
Nwg hu thawj tug ntxhais ua Yemima, hab hu tug ob ua Khexiya, hab hu tug peb ua Kheleehapu.
Taag nrho lub tebchaws hov tsw muaj ib tug puj twg yuav zoo nkauj cuag le Yauj cov ntxhais. Puab txwv muab qub txeeg qub teg faib rua puab ib yaam le faib rua cov nug.
Dhau ntawd lug Yauj tseed muaj txujsa nyob tau ib puas plaub caug xyoo ntxwv, mas nwg pum nwg tej tub hab tej xeeb leej xeeb ntxwv plaub tam tuabneeg.
Yauj tuag rua thaus noob nyoog nchaav hab laug heev lawm.
